snippet: Kevin Garnett, who is averaging career lows in most statistical categories and is having trouble establishing his role, said this season was the most frustrating of his career.
abstract: Kevin Garnett, who is averaging career lows in most statistical categories and is having trouble establishing his role with Brooklyn Nets, says this season is the most frustrating of his career; his focus has shifted almost entirely to being a vocal and aggressive presence on defense, but his inconsistency on offense has been a source of frustration and a blow to his confidence.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett, who is averaging career lows in most statistical categories and is having trouble establishing his role, said this season was the most frustrating of his career.

headline.main: Garnett’s Spirits Dip With His Production
headline.print_headline: Garnett’s Spirits Dip With His Production
